descriptions: Student is unable to recall or apply multiplication facts within 100.
Student recalls few multiplication facts correctly and struggles significantly with fluency.
Student recalls some multiplication facts correctly but is slow and makes frequent errors.
Student recalls most multiplication facts correctly with occasional errors and hesitations.
Student recalls multiplication facts accurately and fluently with few errors.
Student demonstrates mastery of multiplication facts within 100 with speed and accuracy, and can apply them in problem-solving.
Student is unable to recall or apply division facts within 100.
Student recalls few division facts correctly and struggles significantly with fluency.
Student recalls some division facts correctly but is slow and makes frequent errors.
Student recalls most division facts correctly with occasional errors and hesitations.
Student recalls division facts accurately and fluently with few errors.
Student demonstrates mastery of division facts within 100 with speed and accuracy, and can apply them in problem-solving.
Student does not attempt to use strategies or understand the relationship between multiplication and division.
Student attempts to use strategies but applies them incorrectly or inefficiently.
Student uses some strategies with limited success, showing partial understanding of the relationship between multiplication and division.
Student uses appropriate strategies to solve multiplication and division problems, demonstrating understanding of their relationship.
Student effectively uses a variety of strategies to solve multiplication and division problems efficiently.
Student creatively and flexibly applies strategies to solve complex multiplication and division problems, demonstrating a deep understanding of their relationship.
